RelatedSentence: Author Event : Writers Dolores de Leon and Addie Greene will read from their bodies of work at 7 p.m. at the Medford library , 205 S. Central Ave .
Painting Demonstration : Artist Steven La Rose will give an acrylic painting demonstration at the Southern Oregon Society of Artists meeting at 7 p.m. at the Medford library , 205 S. Central Ave .
Poetry Event : Poets Joan Peterson and Susan Clayton - Goldner will discuss their latest collections at 7 p.m. at Bloomsbury Books , 290 E. Main St. , Ashland .
Astrology in Ashland : Seattle astrologer Kate Petty will speak about solstice charts at the Astrology in Ashland meeting at 7 p.m. at Hidden Springs Wellness Center , 1651 Siskiyou Blvd .
Trapeze Class : Karen Bolda leads single - point trapeze dance classes for all levels from 6:30 to 8 p.m. Tuesdays at Dancing People Company , 310 Oak St , Ashland .
Toastmasters Meeting : University Toastmasters meet to improve public speaking and leadership skills at 7 p.m. Tuesdays at the Ashland library , 410 Siskiyou Blvd .
